property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, take an extra turn after this one. Schemes can't be set in motion that turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Take a moment. Ponder the depths of your insignificance."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Nic Klein

card.name: All Shall Smolder in My Wake

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, destroy up to one target artifact, up to one target enchantment, and up to one target nonbasic land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's my goal to find the melting point of every substance."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jim Nelson

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, until your next turn, if a source would deal damage, it deals double that damage instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's a dragon-infested lavascape of notorious peril. Make yourselves at home."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jim Pavelec

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, destroy all nonland permanents target opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'd call that a successful first test. Golem! Rearm the Doom Citadel!"

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jesper Ejsing

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, target opponent chooses a player. Until your next turn, only you and the chosen player can cast spells and attack with creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It seems the fate of the world rests on your shoulders, feeble child."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jim Nelson

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a creature card. Choose one of the revealed creature cards and put it onto the battlefield under your control. Put all other cards revealed this way into their owners' graveyards.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Steve Prescott

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, for each opponent, put up to one target creature card from that player's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Each of those creatures attacks its owner each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tell your old master I said hello."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jesper Ejsing

card.name: A Display of My Dark Power

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, until your next turn, whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana of any type that land produced.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What would you say is my greatest attribute? Is it my gluttonous lust for power?"

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jim Nelson

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library. You draw seven cards, then each other player draws four cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My vision is for the good of everyone. Mostly me."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Franz Vohwinkel

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent reveals their hand. Choose a nonland card from each of those hands. Those players discard those cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Oh, I think I will get away with this."

property.name: Artist
property.value: John Stanko

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, you may pay {X}. If you do, put each nonland permanent target player controls with mana value X or less on the bottom of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May bloodberries grow from your remains."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Martina Pilcerova

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, create seven 0/1 green Plant creature tokens. If you control ten or more lands, create seven 3/3 green Elemental creature tokens instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The plants justify the means."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Austin Hsu

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, target opponent chooses self or others. If that player chooses self, this scheme deals 6 damage to that player. If the player chooses others, this scheme deals 3 damage to each of your other opponents.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Paul Bonner

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, target opponent chooses self or others. If that player chooses self, the player sacrifices two creatures. If the player chooses others, each of your other opponents sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even you have a purpose. Your blood will oil the gears."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Wayne Reynolds

card.name: I Bask in Your Silent Awe

property.name: Type
property.value: Ongoing Scheme

property.name: Rules
property.value: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) Each opponent can't cast more than one spell each turn. At the beginning of your upkeep, if no opponent cast a spell since your last turn ended, abandon this scheme.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Wayne Reynolds

card.name: I Call on the Ancient Magics

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, each other player searches their library for a card, reveals it, and puts it into their hand. Then you search your library for two cards and put them into your hand. Each player shuffles.

property.name: Artist
property.value: John Matson

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent loses 3 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can't imagine what you're feeling right now, but I'll try my best."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Wayne Reynolds

card.name: I Know All, I See All

property.name: Type
property.value: Ongoing Scheme

property.name: Rules
property.value: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) Untap all permanents you control during each opponent's untap step. At the beginning of each end step, if three or more cards were put into your graveyard this turn from anywhere, abandon this scheme.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Chuck Lukacs

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, create a token that's a copy of target permanent an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Heroes innovate. Villains duplicate."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Ralph Horsley

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, exile up to one target creature with flying, up to one target creature without flying, and all cards from up to one target opponent's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You may even see them again. Full digestion takes three hundred years."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Paul Bonner

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, choose one - • Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. • You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Meet my newest minion. Come now, don't be shy - shake her pincer."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Nils Hamm

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, create a 4/6 colorless Golem artifact creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It would be disappointing if you were unable to overcome this simplest of defenses. Hilarious, but disappointing."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jesper Ejsing

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, it deals damage to each opponent equal to the number of cards in that player's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Cranial explosions for everyone. Still planning to outthink my dragons?"

property.name: Artist
property.value: Val Mayerik

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Today I take the reins of destiny itself. Today the Draconic Apocalypse is upon you."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Todd Lockwood

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, target opponent chooses self or others. If that player chooses self, that player sacrifices two lands. If the player chooses others, each of your other opponents sacrifices a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This should halt the spread of your insolence."

property.name: Artist
property.value: John Matson

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent's life total becomes the lowest life total among your opponents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I certainly would have accepted my offer of eternal life. But if you choose death instead, who am I to argue?"

property.name: Artist
property.value: Howard Lyon

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, gain control of all nonland permanents your opponents control until end of turn. Untap those permanents. They gain haste until end of turn. Each of them attacks its owner this turn if able.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Alex Horley-Orlandelli

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, you may pay {X}. If you do, you gain X life and draw X cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can see . . . everything. The beginning and the end of time. The raw edges of reality. And now I see exactly how to kill you."

property.name: Artist
property.value: John Stanko

property.name: Type
property.value: Ongoing Scheme

property.name: Rules
property.value: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) At the beginning of your end step, you may put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. When a creature put onto the battlefield with this scheme dies, abandon this scheme.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Thomas M. Baxa

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent reveals their hand. You may choose a noncreature, nonland card revealed this way and cast it without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Indulge me. Just one spell. One potentially fatal spell gone horribly awry."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Steve Prescott

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, target opponent chooses a creature you don't control and puts it on top of its owner's library, then repeats this process for an artifact, an enchantment, and a land. Then the owner of each permanent chosen this way shuffles.

property.name: Artist
property.value: John Matson

property.name: Type
property.value: Ongoing Scheme

property.name: Rules
property.value: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) Whenever a creature attacks and isn't blocked, if you're the defending player, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token that's blocking that creature. When four or more creatures attack you, abandon this scheme at end of combat.

property.name: Artist
property.value: John Stanko

property.name: Type
property.value: Ongoing Scheme

property.name: Rules
property.value: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) If a source an opponent controls would deal damage to you, prevent 1 of that damage. At the beginning of each end step, if you've been dealt 5 or more damage this turn, abandon this scheme.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jesper Ejsing

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent sacrifices a creature. Then each opponent who didn't sacrifice a creature discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "But nothing will end your regret."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Paul Bonner

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, draw two cards. Artifact spells you cast this turn cost {2} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Cretins build machines. I construct destiny."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Ralph Horsley

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Look around you. All you behold is mine to rule. It's the natural way."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Véronique Meignaud

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, create five 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I assure you, these are not the kind that thrive on sunlight and water."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Paul Bonner

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, for each opponent, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token that attacks that player each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't come back until you've got brains in your teeth."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Steve Prescott

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, target opponent chooses self or others. If that player chooses self, that player discards four cards. If the player chooses others, each of your other opponents discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Or, if you prefer, just surrender."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Howard Lyon

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, destroy up to three target nonland permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Silence your wailing. This is but a taste of the destruction my pets have in store."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Paul Bonner

property.name: Type
property.value: Ongoing Scheme

property.name: Rules
property.value: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.) Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have trample. When a creature you control dies, abandon this scheme.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Val Mayerik

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, you may pay {X}. If you do, this scheme deals X damage to target opponent or planeswalker and each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let that be a lesson to you, your family, and everyone you've ever known."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Steve Prescott

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way onto the battlefield and the rest into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can't abide laziness. Arise, forces of nature, and serve your master!"

property.name: Artist
property.value: Steve Prescott

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, draw four cards. You have no maximum hand size until your next turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen far beyond this imperfect world, into a tomorrow that doesn't include you."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Martina Pilcerova

card.name: Your Will Is Not Your Own

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you set this scheme in motion, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gets +3/+3 and gains trample and haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fool. I'll show you how to use that thing."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Alex Horley-Orlandelli
